debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

sortFeatsByRequirement.label: Sort Features by Requirement
sortFeatsByRequirement.hint: Features are sorted by Requirement first, with a secondary sort on Name, so features that come from the same source (class, race, etc) are grouped together. Note: Actor sheets that you have already opened will not automatically re-sort. Refresh your browser window and re-open the Actor's sheet to re-sort after changing this setting.
